data.passiveDescription: Grants a Bond of Life equal to 25% of Max HP when a Charged Attack hits an opponent. This effect can be triggered up to once every 14s. In addition, when the equipping character has a Bond of Life, they gain a {{12//16//20//24//28%}} DMG Bonus; if the value of the Bond of Life is greater than or equal to 30% of Max HP, then gain an additional {{24//32//40//48//56%}} DMG Bonus.
